respStmt.name: Craig A. Berry, Martin Mueller, and Clifford Wulfman
Lawrence Berland, Hilary Bina, Katherine Gould, Kreg Segal, Nicholas Terrell

publicationStmt.p: The WordHoard Shakespeare is a joint project of the Perseus Project at Tufts University, The Northwestern University Library, and Northwestern University Academic Technologies. It is derived from The Globe Shakespeare , the one-volume version of the Cambridge Shakespeare , edited by W. G. Clark, J. Glover, and W. A. Wright (1891-3). The Internet Shakespeare editions of the quartos and folios have been consulted to create a modern text that observes as closely as possible the morphological and prosodic practices of the earliest editions. Spellings, especially of contracted and hyphenated forms, have been standardized across the corpus. The text has been fully lemmatized and morphosyntactically tagged.

Â© 2003. The copyright to The WordHoard Shakespeare is owned jointly by Northwestern University and Tufts University. The WordHoard Shakespeare is provided for free solely for non-commercial use by students, scholars, and the public. Any commercial use or publication of it, in whole or in part, without prior written authorization of the copyright holders is strictly prohibited.

sourceDesc.p: The Wordhoard Shakespeare is derived from, but not identical with, The Globe Shakespeare , the one-volume version of the Cambridge Shakespeare (1891-3) edited by W. G. Clark, J. Glover, and W. A. Wright.

castItem.roleDesc: a Trojan priest, taking part with the Greeks
Trojan and Greek Soldiers and Attendants

div.head: Act 1, Scene 3
div.stage: The Grecian Camp. Before Agamemnon's tent.
Enter AGAMEMNON, NESTOR, ULYSSES, MENELAUS, and others.

l.stage: Exeunt all but Ulysses and Nestor.

div.head: Act 2, Scene 1
div.stage: A part of the Grecian camp.

div.head: Act 2, Scene 2
div.stage: Troy. A room in Priam's palace.
Enter PRIAM, HECTOR, TROILUS, PARIS, and HELENUS.

div.head: Act 2, Scene 3
div.stage: The Grecian camp. Before Achilles' tent.

sp.speaker: Thersites
sp.stage: Enter AGAMEMNON, ULYSSES, NESTOR, DIOMEDES, and AJAX.

div.head: Act 3, Scene 2
div.stage: Enter PANDARUS and TROILUs' man, meeting.

div.head: Act 3, Scene 3
div.stage: The Grecian camp. Before Achilles' tent.
Enter AGAMEMNON, ULYSSES, DIOMEDES, NESTOR, AJAX, MENELAUS, and CALCHAS.

l.stage: Enter ACHILLES and PATROCLUS, before their tent.

div.head: Act 4, Scene 1
div.stage: Enter, from one side, Aeneas, and Servant with a torch; from the other, PARIS, DEIPHOBUS, ANTENOR, DIOMEDES, and others, with torches.

div.head: Act 4, Scene 2
div.stage: The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

div.head: Act 4, Scene 3
div.stage: The same. Street before Pandarus' house.
Enter PARIS, TROILUS, Aeneas, DEIPHOBUS, ANTENOR, and DIOMEDES.

l.stage: Enter Aeneas, PARIS, ANTENOR, DEIPHOBUS, and DIOMEDES.

div.head: Act 4, Scene 5
div.stage: The Grecian camp. Lists set out.
Enter AJAX, armed; AGAMEMNON, ACHILLES, PATROCLUS, MENELAUS, ULYSSES, NESTOR, and others.

l.stage: Enter HECTOR, armed; Aeneas, TROILUS,and other Trojans, with Attendants.
Ajax and Hector enter the lists.
Exeunt all except Troilus and Ulysses.

div.head: Act 5, Scene 1
div.stage: The Grecian camp. Before Achilles' tent.

sp.speaker: Thersites
sp.stage: Enter HECTOR, TROILUS, AJAX, AGAMEMNON, ULYSSES, NESTOR, MENELAUS, and DIOMEDES, with lights.

l.stage: Exit Diomedes; Ulysses and Troilus following.
Exeunt Achilles, Hector, Ajax, and Nestor.

sp.speaker: Calchas
sp.stage: Enter TROILUS and ULYSSES, at a distance; after them, THERSITES.

div.head: Act 5, Scene 4
div.stage: Plains between Troy and the Grecian camp.

l.stage: Enter MENELAUS, and PARIS, fighting: then THERSITES.
Puts off his helmet and hangs his shield behind him.

div.head: Act 5, Scene 9
div.stage: Enter AGAMEMNON, AJAX, MENELAUS,NESTOR, DIOMEDES, and others, marching. Shouts within.

l.stage: As TROILUS is going out, enter from the other side, PANDARUS.
